item.title: Using Snapshot Testing to validate EF Core schema
item.description: When using Entity Framework Core, I prefer to view the generated schema as SQL. This allows me to easily validate what EF is doing behind the scenes and ensures that no attributes are missed, such as accidentally using nvarchar(max). item.title: Migrate from MSTest to xUnit using a Roslyn analyzer
item.description: Both MSTest and xUnit are great test framework. If you are curious about, I've written many blog posts about them MSTest series If you want to migrate to xUnit from MSTest, I've written a Roslyn Analyzer. This analyzer reports all MSTest attributes and assertions in your code. It can also replace most of them with xUnit equivalent.
